mapper.select: SELECT jp.*, c.companyName, gb.name AS educationName, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tblJpl jpl WHERE jpl.userId = #{userId} AND jpl.jobPostNo = jp.jobPostNo ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isScraped FROM tblJobPost jp JOIN tblCompany c ON jp.companyId = c.companyId LEFT JOIN tblGubn gb ON jp.educationCode = gb.code WHERE gb.groupCode = 'EDUCATION' AND jp.postViewYn = 'Y' ORDER BY RAND();

SELECT jp.*, c.companyName, gb.name AS educationName, COUNT(DISTINCT rs.skillCode) AS matchingSkillCount FROM tblJobPost jp JOIN tblCompany c ON jp.companyId = c.companyId LEFT JOIN tblGubn gb ON jp.educationCode = gb.code JOIN tblJobPostSkill jps ON jp.jobPostNo = jps.jobPostNo JOIN ( SELECT rs.skillCode FROM tblResume r JOIN tblResumeSkill rs ON r.resumeNo = rs.resumeNo WHERE r.userId = #{userId} AND r.viewYn = 'Y' ) AS rs ON rs.skillCode = jps.skillCode WHERE jp.postViewYn = 'Y' GROUP BY jp.jobPostNo ORDER BY matchingSkillCount DESC, RAND()

SELECT jp.*, c.companyName, gb.name AS educationName, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tblJpl jpl WHERE jpl.userId = #{userId} AND jpl.jobPostNo = jp.jobPostNo ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isScraped FROM tblJobPost jp JOIN tblCompany c ON jp.companyId = c.companyId LEFT JOIN tblGubn gb ON jp.educationCode = gb.code WHERE gb.groupCode = 'EDUCATION' AND jp.jobPostNo = #{jobPostNo};
mapper.insert: insert into tblAplcHstr (jobPostNo, resumeNo, aplcHstrDate, passYn) Values (#{jobPostNo},#{resumeNo},now(),'W')
